oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Sing For Your Supper - 1949-05-25
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: WSM program Sing For Your Supper, featuring Owen Bradley and the Skyriders, Snooky Lanson, Dottie Dillard, and announcer Grant Turner. Sponsored by American Ace coffee.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Snooky Lanson; Dottie Dillard; Owen Bradley; Skyriders
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Theme (Sing For Your Supper) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Snooky Lanson, Dottie Dillard) -- Someone Like You (Snooky Lanson) -- American Ace commercial (Snooky Lanson, Dottie Dillard, Grant Turner) -- Always True To You In My Fashion (Dottie Dillard) -- Snooky Lanson and Dottie Dillard talk -- Has Anybody Seen My Gal? (Owen Bradley and the Skyriders) -- Snooky Lanson talks -- Blue Moon (Snooky Lanson) -- American Ace commercial (Snooky Lanson, Grant Turner) -- A Fine Romance (Dottie Dillard, Snooky Lanson) -- Closing statement (Snooky Lanson, Dottie Dillard) -- Theme (Sing For Your Supper) -- Closing statement (Grant Turner) -- Studio ambience
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); Sing for your supper (Radio program); Turner, Grant; Bradley, Owen; Skyriders (Musical group); Lanson, Snooky; Dillard, Dottie
